titles.title: GSP UPDATE Act
GSP Update for Production Diversification and Trade Enhancement Act
To make certain luggage and travel articles eligible for duty-free treatment under the Generalized System of Preferences, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/23/2013--Introduced. GSP Update for Production Diversification and Trade Enhancement Act or GSP UPDATE Act - Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to authorize the President to designate certain luggage and travel articles as eligible for duty-free treatment under the Generalized System of Preferences (GSP).
